mapper.insert: insert into covid_1 (Datetime, CurrentConfirmedCount, ConfirmedCount, SuspectedCount, CuredCount, DeadCount) values(#{datetime}, #{currentConfirmedCount}, #{confirmedCount}, #{suspectedCount}, #{curedCount}, #{deadCount}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CurrentConfirmedCount = #{currentConfirmedCount}, ConfirmedCount = #{confirmedCount}, SuspectedCount = #{suspectedCount}, CuredCount = #{curedCount}, DeadCount = #{deadCount}

insert into covid_2 (DateId, ConfirmedIncr, ConfirmedCount, SuspectedCount, CuredCount, DeadCount) values(#{dateId}, #{confirmedIncr}, #{confirmedCount}, #{suspectedCount}, #{curedCount}, #{deadCount}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ConfirmedIncr = #{confirmedIncr}, ConfirmedCount = #{confirmedCount}, SuspectedCount = #{suspectedCount}, CuredCount = #{curedCount}, DeadCount = #{deadCount}

insert into covid_3 (Datetime, ProvinceShortName, Pid, ConfirmedCount) values(#{datetime}, #{provinceShortName}, #{pid}, #{confirmedCount}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE Pid = #{pid}, ConfirmedCount = #{confirmedCount}

insert into covid_4 (Datetime, CurrentConfirmedCount, ConfirmedCount, SuspectedCount, CuredCount, DeadCount, LocationId, ProvinceShortName, CityName) values(#{datetime}, #{currentConfirmedCount}, #{confirmedCount}, #{suspectedCount}, #{curedCount}, #{deadCount}, #{locationId}, #{provinceShortName}, #{cityName}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CurrentConfirmedCount = #{currentConfirmedCount}, ConfirmedCount = #{confirmedCount}, SuspectedCount = #{suspectedCount}, CuredCount = #{curedCount}, DeadCount = #{deadCount}, ProvinceShortName = #{provinceShortName}, CityName = #{cityName}
